question: The dog ___ (chewed, is chewed, chews) the bone.
The teacher ___ (explained, is explained, explains) the lesson.
The artist ___ (created, creates, is created) a beautiful painting.
The children ___ (played, are played, play) in the park.
The chef ___ (prepared, prepares, is prepared) a delicious meal.
The student ___ (passed, passes, is passed) the exam.
The cat ___ (chased, is chased, chases) the toy mouse.
The gardener ___ (watered, waters, is watered) the flowers.
The bird ___ (flew, flies, is flown) in the sky.
The athlete ___ (won, wins, is won) the race.
